abstract: Hundreds of United Nations staff members sign petition protesting UN's naming of comic book superhero Wonder Woman as its ambassador for women’s empowerment; critics are particularly outraged that appointment, which supporters hope will engage younger generation, followed rejection of several actual female candidates.

headline.print_headline: Wonder Woman Faces Challenge at U.N.: A Recall Petition
headline.main: Wonder Woman Faces Challenge at U.N.: A Recall Petition

snippet: Hundreds of U.N. staff members signed a petition objecting to the appointment of the comic book character as an ambassador for women’s empowerment....
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of U.N. staff members signed a petition objecting to the appointment of the comic book character as an ambassador for women’s empowerment.
